issue.title: Item List not working on some form, Account list also not working on some form..
issue.body:
Hi,
I am newly installed frappe books to my system. I found several errors regarding relation dropdown button as follows
1. In Form "Add New Item" : 
              When I am adding new item to the system the purchase account dropdown list not showing all accounts. 
              e.g. "Cost of Goods Sold" account is not there. Sometimes it may be there and most times not. What is this issue?

2. In Form "Add New Stock Movement"  : 
                Same error occurred. I have total 15 items in list when I tried to add any existing Item it didn't show in the drop down there. and ask to create the new one. When I created new Item as test item from this then only that newly created Item is showing, ( How to add existing 15 items to stock movement?)

![image](https://github.com/frappe/books/assets/124702553/0d281f2f-c59c-4bbe-842b-cb6e4b475f2a)
![image](https://github.com/frappe/books/assets/124702553/3b440957-ec13-40d6-9367-5dd8e1504519)

Requested to resolve this issue on early basis.. :)

comment.body:
The error is resolved when I enable Track Inventory of items.
![image](https://github.com/frappe/books/assets/124702553/dd61990c-a40e-4c2d-a4f8-d73847c5dbba)

issue.title: How to find the link of database file for backup purpose?
issue.body:
Description

I can't find the db path in FB, I need to take regular backup

Steps to Reproduce

N.A.

Info

**Version**: `0.19.0` **Platform**: `win32` **Path**: `/chart-of-accounts` **Language**: `English` **Country**: `in`

comment.body:
Hi @Gaurangb9 , I assume you're running FB on Windows. In Windows, the databases are usually stored under the `Documents/Frappe Books` directory. Other than this there are a couple of hacky ways to find where the DB's are located. 1. DB location is displayed on FB's Title Bar (works on Windows 11) ![image](https://github.com/frappe/books/assets/60477442/3150e75e-f66f-4432-811f-c08be930205f) 2. DB Location is displayed on the Change DB ![image](https://github.com/frappe/books/assets/60477442/87fa35bb-de2d-415f-bc2b-c74f01b5d700)
Click on Change DB and it opens up a page that displays all of the databases Frappe Books has worked with.
![image](https://github.com/frappe/books/assets/60477442/29ac55bb-0497-4497-9680-55d9d936b20f) I hope this helps.

I think the autocomplete code might not suggest availables items from item table.
I am new to system but It may located in the code at "/books/src/components/Controls/AutoComplete.vue"

issue.title: Question: Intergration
issue.body: Hi everyone, I never heard about this product this is great.. I'm currently seeking to add sales automatically into books. Is there anyway how I can add it. Like every sale on my site makes an entry to books?

comment.body:
> Hi everyone, I never heard about this product this is great.. I'm currently seeking to add sales automatically into books. Is there anyway how I can add it. Like every sale on my site makes an entry to books?

Hi @warmachinesocial,
As of now, Frappe Books runs completely offline. It doesn't have the feature you mentioned. Maybe you can use [Import Wizard](https://docs.frappebooks.com/miscellaneous/import-wizard.html) to Import Data into Frappe Books.

issue.title: Status bar is cut off when editing templates
issue.body:
I've started playing around with frappebooks and only by chance discovered that there is a more at the bottom off the screen. On my system it is almost entirely cut off. I've tried versions:
- 0.19
- 0.18
- 0.17.1
- 0.17
- 0.16

Always the same result. I didn't find anything related so I'm reporting it here :-)

System:
i5-9500T / Intel UHD 630
32 GB RAM
Windows 10  Pro - 19045.3570

![status_bar_frappebooks](https://github.com/frappe/books/assets/8441136/7b1958b2-7755-44ef-9986-3aed175497d5)
